articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary featuring Jack Draper against Carlos Alcaraz and Novak Djokovic in the Australian Open fourth round.
articles.title: Australian Open LIVE: Jack Draper vs Carlos Alcaraz, Novak Djokovic v Jiri Lehecka - scores, order of play & radio

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper runs out of steam and retires as Carlos Alcaraz moves into the Australian Open quarter-finals - where he could face Novak Djokovic.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Jack Draper retires against Carlos Alcaraz in Melbourne fourth round

articles.description: Liverpool flew out of the blocks at the start of 2024-25, emerging as serious Premier League title contenders, but their campaign had shown signs of slowing until Darwin Nunez delivered in a 2-0 win at Brentford.
articles.title: 'Moments like this win titles' - Liverpool are 'level above their rivals'

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs move one step closer to an unprecedented 'three-peat' after beating the Houston Texans in the NFL play-offs.
articles.title: NFL play-offs results: Kansas City Chiefs beat Houston Texans to move one step closer to 'three-peat'

articles.description: Coco Gauff fights from a set down to beat Belinda Bencic and join defending champion Aryna Sabalenka in the Australian Open quarter-finals.
articles.title: Australian Open results: Coco Gauff fights back to join Aryna Sabalenka in quarter-finals

articles.description: Islam Makhachev stopped Renato Moicano to retain his UFC lightweight title in stunning fashion at UFC 311 in California.
articles.title: UFC 311: Islam Makhachev breaks Khabib Nurmagomedov's record with win over Renato Moicano

articles.description: La Liga side Real Betis lead the chase to sign Manchester United's Brazil winger Antony on loan.
articles.title: Antony: Real Betis lead chase for Manchester United winger

articles.description: Arsenal have a late goal disallowed as they drop two points in the Premier League title race after throwing away a two-goal lead at home to Aston Villa.
articles.title: Arsenal 2-2 Aston Villa: Visitors fight back from two down to draw in Premier League

articles.description: Shaun Murphy compiles only the sixth 147 maximum break in the history of the Masters, in his semi-final against Mark Allen.
articles.title: Murphy makes 147 maximum break in Masters semi-final win over Allen

articles.description: Daizen Maeda's second-half goal ensures holders Celtic start the defence of their Scottish Cup with a victory over Premiership rivals Kilmarnock.
articles.title: Celtic vs Kilmarnock: Scottish Cup live coverage, stats & head-to-head
